name: cyware-ctix-feed
label: Cyware CTIX Feed
description: An automated Threat Intelligence Platform (TIP) for ingestion, enrichment, analysis, prioritization, actioning, and bidirectional sharing of threat data.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: URL of the CTIX server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: URL of the CTIX server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Access ID
fields.name: access_id
fields.description: Access ID configured for your CTIX server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Access ID configured for your CTIX server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Secret Key
fields.name: secret_key
fields.description: Secret Key configured for your CTIX server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Secret Key configured for your CTIX server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Save Result Set Data
operations.description: Retrieves the detailed list of Save Result Set data for CTIX 3.0 version. All the SDOs are available over the save result set V3 API.

parameters.title: Version
parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the CTIX application.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the version of the CTIX application.

parameters.title: Label Name
parameters.name: label_name
parameters.description: Specify the label name to filter the data.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the label name to filter the data.

parameters.title: Start Datetime
parameters.name: from_timestamp
parameters.description: Specify the datetime from when the data should be fetched.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the datetime from when the data should be fetched.

parameters.title: End Datetime
parameters.name: to_timestamp
parameters.description: Specify the datetime until when the data should be fetched.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the datetime until when the data should be fetched.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: page_size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include per page.
parameters.description: Specify the count of records that the operation should include per page.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. The default value is 1
parameters.description: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. The default value is 1

operations.title: Get Save Result Set Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves the detailed list of Save Result Set Indicators for CTIX 3.0 version. All the Indicator SDOs are available over the save result set V3 API.

parameters.title: Version
parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the CTIX application.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the version of the CTIX application.

parameters.title: Label Name
parameters.name: label_name
parameters.description: Specify the label name to filter the data.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the label name to filter the data.

parameters.title: Start Datetime

parameters.title: End Datetime
parameters.name: to_timestamp
parameters.description: Specify the datetime until when the data should be fetched.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the datetime until when the data should be fetched.

parameters.title: Number of Records to Return
parameters.description: Select whether you want this operation to Fetch Limited Records or Fetch All Records. If you select Fetch Limited Records, then you must specify the following additional parameters: Limit: Maximum number of results that this operation should return. Offset: 1 based index of the page that this operation should return.
parameters.name: record_number

Fetch Limited Records.title: Limit
Fetch Limited Records.name: page_size
Fetch Limited Records.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include per page.
Fetch Limited Records.description: Specify the count of records that the operation should include per page.
